name: The Thing in the Swamp
description:
You are stepping into the shoes of a new hunter coming into the dark and grim world of 'Sunken Hollow' where you will fight monster and discover a dark secret!

Features

  • simple pixel style that provides clear communication
  • basic read and tap input

Credits

  • Nikolas Klein (Art/Programming/Design/Writing)
    • twitter.com/nklskln

Game Design // UE Code & Algorithms I (WS1718) Supervised by: Jörg Reisig
